channel.title: CVE Feed for pluginbuilders -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pluginbuilders -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-4954|2024-08-03T01:55:46.083Z -- pluginbuilders -- waiting%3A%20one-click%20countdowns
item.description: The Waiting: One-click countdowns plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Countdown name in versions up to, and including, 0.6.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
